name: G.A.M.E.
description:
Your ship is damaged and only you can save the crew. Can you trust the ship's artificial intelligence G.A.M.E. to help you save the day?

Movement: WASD
Interact: Spacebar
Shoot: Point and click with mouse

Note: This was my first jam game so any comments/criticisms are more than welcome! Created for the Community Game Jam 2019
